main event: A small child reported seeing a light-colored object moving swiftly at a low altitude in Alexandria, Virginia, on the night of 11 October 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted only 20 seconds., The child was very frightened and unable to provide a clear account., The object's color was light, and it disappeared behind some trees., The child's mother was cooperative but also had no additional details., There was no physical evidence or photographs associated with the sighting.
witness description: a small child who was frightened by the incident
